data.event: Based on a document from 1198 which makes official mention of the town's name, Lisse celebrated its 800-year anniversary in 1998, although there is an indication that there was already a settlement there in the 10th century.

Based on a document from 1198 which makes official mention of the town's name, Lisse celebrated its 800-year anniversary in 1998, although there is an indication that there was already a settlement there in the 10th century.

event.title: the wars of Charles the Bold and the Eighty Years

data.event: Because of prolonged warfare (particularly the wars of Charles the Bold and the Eighty Years' War), poverty was prevalent.
